name: Demon Hunter: Legacy (game jam edition)
description:
(Created for a game jam during a weekend)

Play this dark fantasy text adventure / interactive fiction / CYOA game. Multiple choices along the way, attribute trials, battles against monsters. Create your character and save your daughter from Bathory, the Blood Countess.

Fight your way and build your legacy: you will be remembered according to your actions!

You can save, reload, restart or even turn a "page" back almost anytime :)
